data.name: The Last Friend's Digital Art Collection Book
data.detailed_description:
Enjoy over 70 pages of amazing concept art, designs, and other artwork from the awesome team at Stonebot Studios and Ludus Games.

Exclusive to those who purchased the game before launch through Xsolla!
data.about_the_game:
Enjoy over 70 pages of amazing concept art, designs, and other artwork from the awesome team at Stonebot Studios and Ludus Games.

Exclusive to those who purchased the game before launch through Xsolla!
data.short_description: The Exclusive Digital Artbook for those that Pre-Order The Last Friend through Xsolla!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher (64 bit)
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Intel® Core™ i5-750 or 3.2 GHz AMD Phenom™ II X4 95
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 compliant video card
